department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Supplies meat, fish, and poultry on an as-and-when-required basis for government departments.
full_summary:
=====================================

Tender Announcement:** [EC095-230052] Regional Master Standing Offer for Meat, Fish, and Poultry Zone 2
=====================================

**Title**: EC095-230052 Regional Master Standing Offer for Meat, Fish, and Poultry Zone 2

**Reference Number**: WS3930664986-Doc4014872698

**Publication Date**: May 18, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: June 9, 2023, 2:00 pm EDT

**Government of Canada procuring on behalf of:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Supply and Service Requirements**:
=====================================

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) for zone 2 for the supply, delivery, and offloading of various quantities of meat, fish, and poultry products. These products will be required on an “as and when requested” basis for the period of the RMSO, expected to be in effect from May 1, 2023, to June 30, 2023.

**Trade Agreements**:

* Contractor must comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Delivery Regions**:

* New Brunswick
* Nova Scotia
* Canada
* Newfoundland and Labrador

**Technical Specifications**:

* Products are classified under the following UN SPSC codes:
	+ *50110000* - Meat and poultry products
	+ *50111500* - Minimally processed meat and poultry products
	+ *50112000* - Processed meat and poultry products

**Eligibility Requirements**:

* Bidder must be a Canadian-owned and operated company.

**Procurement Method**:

* Competitive - Open bidding.

**Evaluation Criteria**:

* Lowest price.

**Notice and Documents**:

The complete notice and accompanying documents may be accessed on the [Ariba Discovery] website.

**Contact Information**:

For any inquiries or questions, please contact Andrew MacFarlane at [andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).  CN350007772
